alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Louis County through 415 PM CDT... At 344 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eveleth, or 17 miles east of Hibbing, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and Torrential Rainfall which may lead to localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central St. Louis County, including the following locations... Iron Junction, Leonidas, Esquagama Lake, Melrude, Murphy Lake, West Two Rivers Reservoir, Makinen, Zim and Mckinley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.
